Data.mail.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -{{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}[#]{{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}'s Note
Data.mail.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}}
Data.mail.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}} 2
Data.mail.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}} 3
Data.mail.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've traveled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-{{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}} 4
Data.mail.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}} 5
Data.mail.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{AHDPnG_Elena_Upper28}} 6
Data.mail.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -{{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}[#]{{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}}'s Reading

Data_Events.AnimalShop.3900074/f Shane 2: {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Upper30}} {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}'s in the barn. {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Upper00}} said... Uh... {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Upper00}} said to tell you {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Lower00}} wants to show you something.
It's the perfect home for you hens...$8#$b#We'll have the best eggs in the whole valley!$8#$b#Fresh and healthy, with rich golden yolks. Not like those pale, sickly Joja eggs...$8

...*sigh*...$9#$b#...You know, Charlie... I was thinking... $9#$b#A {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Lower58}} like me is always teetering on the edge of despair... know what I mean?$9#$b#...But you and the other hens are going to keep me upright from now on... I know it.$9#$b#...$9#$b#What's wrong... too much pressure? *chuckle*$8
Hey, @... so, what do you think?$h
My special blue hens... I've been raising them in secret for the last few months.$6

I... Well, I won't be living here forever, and I wanted to pass something on to Jas. I've been teaching her how to care for them.$6#$b#...I want to feel like I'm not just a leech on the world. I want to contribute somehow, even in a small way like this.
Data_Events.AnimalShop.3910674/f Shane 1: @... Can you do something? {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Upper00}}'s out cold.$s
{{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer!$s
What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?
Hopefully I won't be around long enough to need a 'plan'...
Data_Events.AnimalShop.3910974/f Shane 1: Hi {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}... you look unusually happy today.
You're right... I haven't felt this light since I was a kid.$h
Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer?$u
No, actually. I've been drinking sparkling water instead of beer... and I feel great!$h
You know, I sometimes forget that I really do have friends, people that care about me.#$b#And it's okay for me to rely on them... it doesn't make me weak.
Hi Jas. I've got something for you.$6
Th... These are real bunny-jewel slippers!!$h
B... But these are so expensive!$3#$b#How did you afford them?$3
I've cut back on an expensive habit. I have a lot more spending money now!$h
Data_Events.Beach.733330/f Sam 750/w sun: I'm just keeping an eye on my little brother. It's good for him to get some fresh air on a day like this.
Our Dad used to take us to the beach on sunny days like this.$h
Is Dad ever going to come home?$s
Of course, Vince. Dad's going to come back as soon as he possibly can.$7
But I heard some grown-ups saying that... that all of our troops are getting shot to pieces.$s

Don't you remember how strong Dad is? He'd never let a pathetic Gotoro grunt get him like that! Don't you worry!$a#$b#And always remember that Mom and I are here to play with you if you ever feel lonely.
To be honest, I have no idea if my old man will come back... We've all read the reports. Our soldiers are falling by the thousands.$s#$b#But what am I going to say to Vincent?$7
#It's best to be honest with kids.#You did the right thing. Kids should have hope.
You think so?$7#$b#Maybe you're right... The world is a cruel place, but kids have to learn that one way or another.$s~Yeah... kids should play and have fun while they still have the chance.

Hey did I tell you the band's starting to come together?#$b#Yeah! It turns out {{AHDPnG_Abel_Name}}'s a pretty good drummer. And {{AHDPnG_Sabrina_Name}} seemed to really want {{AHDPnG_Abel_Lower03}} in the band...$h
Data_Events.Farm.2118991/e 3910975/t 600: Oh man... Uh... How do I say this?$s#$b#I'm really sorry about what happened at the cliffs. That was... embarrassing...
$q -1 null#  #$r -1 10 event_apologize1#I'm glad I was there to help.#$r -1 -10 event_apologize2#You needed a serious wake-up call.#$r -1 10 event_apologize3#I'm just happy you're still here.
I've decided I want to see a therapist. {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}} got me in touch with a colleague of {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Lower06}}...$s
Anyway... I just wanted to thank you for taking care of me. And I want you to know that I'm going to take things a little more seriously from now on.#$b#I don't want to be a burden on anyone...
Data_Events.Farm.3917587/f Alex 3500/O A: Hey, @. Before you head out...#$b#I hate to ask this... but can I have 5,000g?#$b#It's for a secret project I'm working on... I know we have a joint bank account, but I thought I should ask anyway.
Really? You won't spare a measly 5,000g to make me happy?$a#$b#I didn't know you were such a cheapskate...$s
I just wanted to have a little fun...$s
I don't want to talk to you right now...$s
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Lower/t 600 1130: You seem to be doing well... the farm looks great!$h
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Upper/t 600 1130: I just remembered... I have a sewing machine at my old place!
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Lower/t 600 1130: So... you've been here a while, and I'm sure you've acquired some 'cloth' by now... right?
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Upper/t 600 1130: If you ever feel like making clothes, you should swing by and check it out.$h
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Lower/t 600 1130: Well, did you know that you can use cloth to tailor all kinds of clothes? All you need is access to a sewing machine...#$b#And I happen to have one at home! Feel free to swing by and use it any time.$h
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Upper/t 600 1130: You can now access {{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}'s sewing machine!
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Lower/t 600 1130: You can now access {{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}'s sewing machine!
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Upper/t 600 1130: To start tailoring, you'll need a piece of cloth and a secondary item. Experiment and see what unique styles are out there!#$b#I'm going to have a lot of fun seeing you in all kinds of different outfits!$h
Data_Events.Farm.992559_Lower/t 600 1130: To start tailoring, you'll need a piece of cloth and a secondary item. Experiment and see what unique styles are out there!
Data_Events.FarmHouse.3917601/f Emily 35: Welcome home, @. I hope you had a nice day.
So... I finished that secret project I was working on.
It's a brand new hand-made outfit for you!$h
Received {{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}'s Magic Hat, {{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}'s Magic Boots, {{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}'s Magic Shirt, and a matching set of pants!

I've always loved sewing and making crafts... So I thought it'd be nice to make you something by hand. I had a lot of fun!#$b#I hope it fits right... and that the fiber isn't too itchy.#$b#There's boots, a hat, a shirt, and pants! It's a complete outfit.
Now, when you wear those clothes, you'll think of me... and you'll know I'm here waiting for you to come home safe... okay?$l
Data_Events.FarmHouse.3918601/e 3918600/: 'Dear {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Name}}, we are pleased to offer you a position as 'junior composer' at Zuzu Broadcasting Group, TV division...'$6#$b#Wow! Music for a TV show! How cool is that?!$h
Oh... Hold on...$s#$b#... It's a TV show for little kids... 'The Happy Junimo Show'$s
Not exactly what I had in mind...$s
Hmm... Yeah, I guess that's one way to look at it.$7
I mean... you're right, someone's gotta make children's music. But it's not exactly a 'dream job'...$7
Ah well... that's okay. I'll make the best of it, like I always do.$7
I guess I'd better start 'thinking like a kid'...
Hmm... That's not a bad idea. At the very least, I could play him my songs and see if he likes them.#$b#Thanks for the advice, @.$10
I'll be working on this for a few days.
Data_Events.FarmHouse.3918603/e 3918602/: Okay, okay, Vince... I'm gonna put the song on right away.$h#$b#Now, you gotta listen really close, so you can tell me if you like it afterwards. Okay?
Wow! I wasn't expecting such an overwhelming response!$8#$b#That's great! This is really fun!$h
Hey, thanks for all the support with this.#$b#You know... I kind of like making children's music. It's not very glamorous, but I'm making these kids really happy. That's important!$h
Here, I wanted to give you this. It's a boombox with the song on it... So you can listen to it whenever you want.
I'm just glad to know that my music makes people happy...
Data_Events.FarmHouse.4324303/e 4325434/: Notice anything unusually soft? I quilted this custom bedspread by hand.$11
I'm glad you like it. The house is starting to look really cozy, isn't it?$h
Oh.. okay.$s#$b#I put the old furniture in a chest... feel free to change it back...$s
{{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}}'s been working very hard around the house...
Data_Events.Forest.181928/f Penny 2000/t: Oh, @! It's perfect timing that you showed up.
I brought the children on a little field trip into the countryside.#$b#You know all about life in the country, right?$h
$q -1 null#So I was thinking... could you be my guest speaker today?#$r -1 10 event_speaker_yes#I'd love to!#$r -1 0 event_speaker_yes#Sure.#$r -1 -1500 event_speaker_no#No... I can't stand kids.
Jas! Vincent! May I have your attention please!

I have a very special guest here to talk to you today... our very own local farmer, @.#$b#He has first-hand experience living in the countryside... so he knows all about the valley's 'natural resources'!^She has first-hand experience living in the countryside... so she knows all about the valley's 'natural resources'!
Can anyone tell me what a 'natural resource' is?
A natural resource is a material source of wealth that occurs in a natural state and has economic value.$4
Very good! That's worth two star points, Jas.
Okay, now let's give @ our full attention.
#Country life is all about farming.#Country life is all about gathering from the wild.
#This valley is chock-full of precious minerals.#The water around here is teeming with fresh seafood.#You'll find no better lumber south of Grampleton.
Mr. @, are you going to marry {{AHDPnG_Peter_Lower61}} {{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}}?$s^Ms. @... Um, do you have a boyfriend?
Vincent! That's not an appropriate question! Behave yourself, or I'll have to take away all your star points for the day.$a
Data_Events.Forest.3091462/e 3911124/O L: Um... {{AHDPnG_Leif_Name}}? How much longer will this be?$s#$b#...My knees are quivering, my thighs are whimpering, and I've lost all sensation in my foot.$s
Just keep perfectly still, Marnie... No squirming!$h
Hey, @... what style do you think I should do? I'm up for anything...
Stick with the classic look, huh? Yeah, I think Marnie will appreciate that.
Good idea! That sounds fun... Let me get some more yellow paint on the palette...
Hmm... not my usual style, but I'll give it a shot. I'd better switch to acrylic paint for this one...
How's yours coming along?
Wow, I like your confidence!$h#$b#Who knows? Maybe you'll become the next Lupini!$h#$b#...Can't wait to see it.
Hey, that's all I ask. If you keep trying your best you can't help but get better at it!
Hey, that's okay! You gotta start somewhere. And you never know, one person's chicken scratch is another person's 'modern art'.
Make me look good!
Shh!
Now, don't forget the techniques I taught you... broad strokes, hold the brush like so...
There!
What do you think?
Oooh!
I love it! That's going up in my room...$h
Now, let's see what you've got, @.
Erm... It's... interesting!$6#$b#It's, uh... a different kind of approach, for sure...$6
Let me see
Marnie, you can hang both of these in your room!$h
Em... @, why don't you go ahead and keep yours? It might be nice to, uh... own your first-ever painting... ya know?$s
Um... Honey? Where were you planning to hang that painting you did?$3

Data_Events.Forest.choseFarming.003: Um, Farmer @? If I eat your veggies will I grow up strong like my big {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Lower26}} {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Name}}?#$b#{{AHDPnG_Samantha_Upper00}}'s so strong, I saw {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Lower02}} lift {{AHDPnG_Peter_Lower61}} {{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}} clear off the ground last night when they were climbing into a tree.$h
Data_Events.Forest.choseFarming.004: Vincent! It's not good to gossip!$a
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.001: KEL: I found your online art store... weren't you wondering about the 'Mr. K' who kept buying all your sculptures?
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.002: You're 'Mr. K'? I... I thought it was just a rich guy who truly loved my art.$s
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.003: KEL: Heh. Well, you were half right...
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.004: KEL: Look, {{AHDPnG_Leif_Name}}. I want you back. I miss you, babe.
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.005: Ew, don't call me that!$a#$b#You never supported my art before... now that I've had some success you want me back? You make me sick.$a
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.007: #Punch Kel in the face.#Try reasoning with Kel.
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.009: Well, he's fine... but that was pretty violent, @.^She's fine... but that was pretty violent, @.
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.010: Let's get out of here. I don't think Kel will be bothering us anymore.
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.011: Let's find a more secluded spot this time...$l
Data_Events.Forest.choseInternet.012: Well, the picnic didn't pan out like I wanted it to.$h
Data_Events.Forest.noPunch.001: KEL: I have nothing to say to you. Get out of my way.
Data_Events.Forest.noPunch.002: KEL: Seriously, {{AHDPnG_Leif_Name}}... What are you doing out here with this simple-minded bumpkin?
Data_Events.Forest.noPunch.003: @'s a better ${man^person}$ than you in every respect!$a#$b#Now get out of here and never come back!$a
Data_Events.Forest.noPunch.004: Let's go, @. I don't think Kel will be bothering us anymore.
Data_Events.Forest.noPunch.005: Let's find a more secluded spot this time...$l

Data_Events.HaleyHouse.11/f Haley 500/p: Urgghh! I always clean under the cushions! It's YOUR turn this week!$a
You're being childish, {{AHDPnG_Hayden_Name}}. I do the vast majority of work in this house, and you know it.$u
Oh, it's that new ${farm boy^girl from the farm}$.$7
Hey, I bet you'll understand my point of view here.
*sigh*... I'm really sorry to involve you in this, @. {{AHDPnG_Hayden_Name}} is complaining because I asked {{AHDPnG_Hayden_Lower03}} to clean under the cushions.$u

$q 45 null#It's only because I cleaned them last week!$a#$r 46 -50 Event_clean2#Stop whining and just clean it!#$r 45 30 Event_clean1#{{AHDPnG_Hayden_Name}}, why not have this be your one weekly job?#$r 46 -30 Event_clean3#{{AHDPnG_Emmett_Name}}, take the high road and do it this time.
Alright, you win. I guess this can be my job every week. Then there won't be any reason to argue over it.$u
Thanks, @. That was a great solution.$h
Data_Events.HaleyHouse.195012/f Haley 25: Never thought you'd find all your 'significant others' in one room, huh @?$a
I... I thought you were different than other men...$s^You tricked all of us into thinking we loved you... You're horrible...$a
How could you do this to us, @?$s
You think you're real smooth, don't you? Thought you'd sample the whole 'buffet', huh? What a sleeze...$a
Th... That night in the tent... you whispered such sweet things to me in the dark...$s#$b#Now I have to face each day knowing it was all a lie.$s
Well, we stick together! And we're not going to put up with this!$a^Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer!$a
Well? What do you have to say for yourself?$a
#I'm sorry... what I did was wrong.#Everyone, calm down! I can explain...
Nice try, but that's not going to cut it...$u
...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, everyone?$u
We're all gonna give you the cold shoulder!$a
Data_Events.HaleyHouse.917409/e 463391/f: Come in, @! I want to show you something.$h
It's my secret hobby... I've been practicing for months.#$b#Now, sit back, relax, and allow yourself to be carried away to a better place... okay?
$q 213 null#So... *gasp*... what did you think?$h#$r 213 25 event_dance1#That was amazing!#$r 213 -50 event_dance2#That was embarrassing...#$r 213 25 event_dance1#(Say nothing and do a slow clap)
Phew... that was quite a workout...$u
I haven't been this sweaty since I ordered the pepper platter at {{AHDPnG_Abel_Name}}'s graduation fiesta!$h
...Well, I'd better take a shower. Thanks for watching.
Don't tell anyone about the dance. That was for your eyes only.
Data_Events.HaleyHouse.choseToExplain.00: #I thought we were just friends! I didn't know it was so serious!#Pierre pressured me! He wanted to sell more bouquets!#Everyone, this is completely normal! It's just a lifestyle choice...
Do you really expect us to believe that? You're just digging yourself into a deeper hole...$a
...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, everyone?$u
We're all gonna give you the cold shoulder!$a
Data_Events.HaleyHouse.lifestyleChoice.0: Hmmph! I don't know what's considered 'normal' in Zuzu City, but I'm definitely not okay with this arrangement!$a
It's not a 'choice' if none of us even know about it!$a
You can't weasel your way out of this one, @.$a
...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, everyone?$u
We're all gonna give you the cold shoulder!$a
Data_Events.Hospital.571102/f Harvey 200: Hello? Hello? Is anyone out there?$9
This is Dr. H at... 52 North 43.5 East... Seeking aerial response...Anyone out there?$9
Copy.. Dr. H on the ground... this is Blackbird Fiver Fiver Zuzu. Anything to report?
Someone's there!?$10#$b#Er... I mean!... Standard ground report: Wind at 3 Clicks, 36 Degrees North of West. Ground Temperature at 42 Kraggs. Humidity 53%. Dr. H out!$10
#Ask {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}} why {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Lower00}}'s all flustered.#Pretend like everything's normal.
Ah, well... You see, I was just on my radio here... and I made contact with a real pilot!
As a matter of fact, we can probably see him flying overhead right now!
As a kid, my dream was always to be a pilot.
...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away.$s
It's okay... don't be sad.#$b#I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is.
Hey, let me show you my model airplanes. I just finished the new TR-Starbird deluxe set.$h
Data_Events.Hospital.7/f Maru 1000/p Mar: *sigh*... I'm so sick of preparing these samples...$s
The whole sample is ruined... {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}}'s going to kill me...$s

$q 38 null#@, what should I do?#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#Just scoop it off the floor. {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Upper00}} won't know the difference.#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#Tell {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}} it was my fault.#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#Tell {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}} it was an accident.
What happened? I heard something break.
$p 38#I accidentally dropped one of the samples... I'm so sorry.$s|@ came in and slammed the door so loud I dropped this sample.$u
You shouldn't blame others for your own problems, {{AHDPnG_Micah_Name}}.$a
*sigh*... I'll have to call the patient back in to recollect this sample.$s#$b#This'll probably put us in the red for another month...$s
Data_Events.Hospital.toldTruth.001: Thanks for telling me the truth, {{AHDPnG_Micah_Name}}.#$b#Don't worry about the sample, we'll just get another one.
Data_Events.Hospital.toldTruth.002: Thanks for being patient with me, Doctor {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}}.
Data_Events.Hospital.toldTruth.003: Of course... you've been a big help around here. I don't know what I'd do without you!
Data_Events.Hospital.toldTruth.004: @? You look a little pale... are you feeling okay?
Data_Events.JoshHouse.56/f Harvey 500/p: Okay, George. I want you take a deep breath for me.

George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.#$b#I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms.
Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?
I'm your doctor, George. That's who I am...#$b#And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy.
Oh!#$b#I'm sorry, but you shouldn't be here... these check-ups are supposed to be private.
Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young man.^Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady.

$q 84 null#@, what do you think George should do?#$r 84 40 event_george1 friend_George_-20#George should follow Dr. {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}}'s advice.#$r 84 40 event_george1 friend_George_-20#George knows what's best for his own body.
Fine. I'll do what you say, doctor.
$p 84#Thanks for your help, @. I appreciate it.$h|It's better not to give my patients mixed messages, @. Please remember that in the future.
Data_Events.ManorHouse.2123243/e 2111194: You're probably wondering... what is clothing therapy?#$b#I'll try to explain.

So many of us are struggling with personal issues... things holding us back from living how we want.$u#$b#It's important to me that everyone has a free and happy life... so I came up with a new kind of therapy to help people achieve that.$u
It's based on the amazing power of self-expression. Self-expression is a wonderful healing tool, did you know that?
Behind this curtain, you'll find racks and racks of clothes. There's endless options to choose from.

Your job is simple: find the outfit that truly speaks to you, and put it on.#$b#Feel confident in yourself and your choice. You all have a unique style to share with the world!#$b#{{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}, you're up first!$h
Ah, @. You're just in time. Just observe and keep an open mind... okay?
{{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}, it's a new side of you we've never known about. That's great!#$b#Now, go outside with confidence and show the world!
Well, that went very well!#$b#I just hope this experience helps everyone break out of their shells a bit.
I couldn't do it! I don't wanna break out of my shell!$6
...Oh. I... I guess I'm interrupting something here, aren't I?$7
I understand. I'll leave now... Congrats, @.$7

As a way of saying 'Thank You', I'd like to present you with this Town's greatest honor... The Stardew Hero Award. You've earned it!$h

#Let's be reasonable.#Let's settle this the old-fashioned way.
It's of no consequence! I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness! You'll see!$h
I remember when I first moved to Pelican Town... This building was active and vibrant.#$b#We worked together to make the town a better place. There was a real sense of community.

Hehe... That I do. We showed up one morning and the place was crawlin' with 'em.$h

I still dream of that garlic butter.

You see, everyone? Our community is what makes Pelican Town special.#$b#When JojaMart came to town we lost sight of that.$s#$b#But now, thanks to @, we have a second chance.#$b#I'm asking that you join me in boycotting JojaMart! We have the power to reclaim our old way of life!

Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.004: As some of you know, I came to this town because I wanted to draw inspiration from the beautiful surroundings.

Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.006: I haven't named this one, yet. She started out as an exercise in human anatomy, but I ended up seeing her through to completion.#$b#Her expression is intentionally unclear... is she embarrassed, amused, pained? I'll leave that for you to decide.

Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.008: I've been calling this one 'Egg Heads'. I wanted to create an animatronic humanoid statue to toy with the viewer's ability to properly attribute personhood to a physical entity.
Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.009: And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'. It's a celebration of my favorite sculpting material... wood.
Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.010: Well, those are my sculptures!$l#$b#Oh! One last thing.
Data_Events.Town.53/e 55/t 1500 1700.011: I'd like to say thanks to my special friend, @.#$b#He gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. Data_Events.WizardHouse.112/n seenJunimo: Ah... Come in.
I am Rasmodius... Seeker of the arcane truths.#$b#Mediary between physical and ethereal.#$b#Master of the seven elementals.#$b#Keeper of the sacred cha-... you get the point.
And you... @. The one whose arrival I have long foreseen.
Here, I'd like to show you something.
Behold!
You've seen one before, haven't you?
They call themselves the 'Junimos'...#$b#Mysterious spirits, these ones... For some reason, they refuse to speak with me.
I'm not sure why they've moved into the community center, but you have no reason to fear them.
Hmmm? You found a golden scroll written in an unknown language?#$b#Most interesting...
Stay here. I'm going to see for myself. I'll return shortly.
I found the note...
The language is obscure, but I was able to decipher it:
We, the Junimo, are happy to aid you. In return, we ask for gifts of the valley. If you are one with the forest then you will see the true nature of this scroll.
Hmm... 'One with the forest'... What do they mean?
...*sniff*...*sniff*...
Ah-hah!$h
Come here!$h
My cauldron is bubbling with ingredients from the forest.$h#$b#Baby fern, moss grub, caramel-top toadstool... Can you smell it?$h
Here. Drink up. Let the essence of the forest permeate your body.$h
You've gained the power of forest magic! Now you can decipher the true meaning of the Junimo scrolls.

Strings.StringsFromMaps.JoshHouse.7: You peek into {{AHDPnG_Alexis_Name}}'s drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.JoshHouse.8: You peek into {{AHDPnG_Alexis_Name}}'s drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.JoshHouse.9: It's {{AHDPnG_Alexis_Name}}'s gridball helmet. Looks like {{AHDPnG_Alexis_Lower00}} keeps it polished.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.LeahHouse.2: It's a stack of {{AHDPnG_Leif_Name}}'s paintings. It's mostly landscapes and studies of nature.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.LeahHouse.5: It's a wooden sculpture {{AHDPnG_Leif_Name}}'s working on. It has a wonderful cedar smell.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.SamHouse.10: --Report Card--^Name: Vincent^^Reading: C^Spelling: D^Math: C^Social Studies: B-^Art: B-^Sports:A^^Note:Vince is a good boy, but he could make do with a little more studying!^  -{{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}}
Strings.StringsFromMaps.SamHouse.11: It's {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Name}}'s computer. {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Upper00}}'s got an extensive library of computer games.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.SamHouse.9: {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Name}}'s electric guitar. It has a pair of active pickups and a whammy bar.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.ScienceHouse.2: For a gadgeteer, {{AHDPnG_Micah_Name}}'s computer is pretty old. {{AHDPnG_Micah_Upper01}}'s still backing up {{AHDPnG_Micah_Lower04}} files to floppy disk.
Strings.StringsFromMaps.ScienceHouse.7: It's some kind of device {{AHDPnG_Micah_Name}}'s working on. It looks pretty scrappy.
Strings.Weapons.AbbysPlanchette_Descript: {{AHDPnG_Abel_Name}} claims it's made from cursed marblewood.
Strings.Weapons.AlexsBat_Description: The sweet spot is dented from {{AHDPnG_Alexis_Name}}'s famous Grand Slam.
Strings.Weapons.ElliottsPencil_Descripti: {{AHDPnG_Elena_Name}} used this to write {{AHDPnG_Elena_Lower05}} book. It's sharp!
Strings.Weapons.HaleysIron_Description: It's searing hot and smells like {{AHDPnG_Hayden_Name}}'s hair.
Strings.Weapons.HarveysMallet_Descriptio: It brings back memories of {{AHDPnG_Harriet_Name}}'s clinic.
Strings.Weapons.MarusWrench_Description: A big, metal wrench. It smells like {{AHDPnG_Micah_Name}}.
Strings.Weapons.PennysFryer_Description: {{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}}'s favorite frying pan. There's some rubbery gunk stuck to the inside.
Strings.animationDescriptions.haley_phot: %{{AHDPnG_Hayden_Name}}'s too involved with {{AHDPnG_Hayden_Lower04}} camera to notice you.
Strings.animationDescriptions.sam_work: %{{AHDPnG_Samantha_Name}}'s on the clock... better not get {{AHDPnG_Samantha_Lower02}} in trouble.
Strings.animationDescriptions.shane_work: %{{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Name}}'s hard at work. {{AHDPnG_Shaylin_Upper00}} doesn't seem interested in talking.
Strings.animationDescriptions.vincent_re: Ms. {{AHDPnG_Peter_Name}} says I have to read this book before I can go play.$s
